titles.title: Burt Lake Band of Ottawa and Chippewa Indians Act
To reaffirm and clarify the Federal relationship of the Burt Lake Band as a distinct federally recognized Indian Tribe, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Native American Affairs.

bill.summary: 4/14/1994--Introduced. Burt Lake Band of Ottawa and Chippewa Indians Act - Reaffirms Federal recognition and rights of the Burt Lake Band of Ottawa and Chippewa Indians (in the State of Michigan), including Federal services, benefits, and tribal lands.
